document.docAuthor: Konstantinov, Fedor V. & Namyatova, Anna A.
document.masterDocTitle: New records of Orthotylinae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae) from the Palaearctic Region

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New records of Orthotylinae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae) from the Palaearctic Region

subSubSection.paragraph: Species of broad Palaearctic distribution, introduced to North and South America . New for Mongolia and Turkmenistan .
